divs: Sighting DetailsSaw first light and at first thought it to be a reflection on a plastic wind break on the deck. I left the deck to get a better look and followed the object from horizon to horizon as best as the trees would let me see. I strained to hear any engine sound but heard none. After the object became obscured by the trees I made sure to verify the conditions and time, the sky was overcast. I tried to did miss what I had seen while observing the weather condition and saw the same color and size objected following the same course speed and heading. I followed the second object until it was obscured by the trees and listing for some type of engine sound but heard nothing. I don't think it makes a difference on my sighting but we were experiencing a partial power outage at the time.
Summary: orange silent movied west to east followed by a second sighting on same path
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Toledo
There were no other sightings in Toledo on or around August 3rd 2013
